item.title: Removing Trading From The Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

Alright, I just tried that and now it’s giving me this:

src\server\model\players\packets\Trade.java:21: isinWild(int,int,int) in server. model.players.Client cannot be applied to () if(c.isinWild()) { ^

so I tried changing this:

if(c.isinWild()) {

into this:

if(c.isinWild(absX,absY,1)) {

but now, it gives me this:

src\server\model\players\packets\Trade.java:21: cannot find symbol symbol : variable absX location: class server.model.players.packets.Trade if(c.isinWild(absX,absY,1)) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Trade.java:21: cannot find symbol symbol : variable absY location: class server.model.players.packets.Trade if(c.isinWild(absX,absY,1)) { ^

Read full topic

item.title: Removing Trading From The Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @hahabob2 hahabob2
item.description:
@hahabob2 wrote:

Replace if(isinwild()) { with if(c.isinWild()) {. As well as replacing public boolean isinwild(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((absX <= 2940) || (absX >= 3400) ||(absY <= 3522) || (absY >= 3970)){ return true; } return false; } With this public boolean isinWild(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((absX <= 2940) || (absX >= 3400) ||(absY <= 3522) || (absY >= 3970)){ return true; } return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Removing Trading From The Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

Okay… I almost have it, I think.

I put this, in my client class.

public boolean isinwild(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((absX <= 2940) || (absX >= 3400) ||(absY <= 3522) || (absY >= 3970)){ return true; } return false; }

and this, in my trade method…

if(isinwild()) { c.sendMessage("You can't trade in the wilderness!"); return; }

But I still keep getting this error.

src\server\model\players\TradeAndDuel.java:34: cannot find symbol symbol : method isinwild() location: class server.model.players.TradeAndDuel if(isinwild()) { ^

Maybe I’m doing it wrong, I’m still kind of new, but I’ve been at this for a few hours, I really want to learn. Any help is appreciated.

Read full topic
